name: atomic-design-commands
description: Atomic Design methodology commands for AI agents

commands.name: atomic-scaffold
commands.description: Generate folder and stub files for an atom, molecule, or organism. Follows Brad Frost's hierarchy: atoms are single elements, molecules combine atoms, organisms combine molecules.

parameters.name: component_name
parameters.description: Name of the component (e.g., Button, ProductCard).

commands.name: atomic-tokens-check
commands.description: Verify components use design tokens instead of hardcoded colors, spacing, font sizes, or shadows.

parameters.name: component_code_or_paths
parameters.description: Component code or file path(s) to scan.

example_output.suggested_fixes: Replace hardcoded values with token references.

commands.name: atomic-composition
commands.description: Suggest how to compose atoms into molecules or organisms from a UI description or mockup.

parameters.name: ui_description_or_mockup
parameters.description: Description of the UI or reference to a mockup.

example_input.ui_description_or_mockup: Product card with image, title, price, and Add to cart button

commands.name: atomic-document
commands.description: Generate style-guide documentation for an Atomic component: purpose, props, usage, tokens.
commands.example_output: Markdown with purpose, props (types/defaults), usage example, tokens used.
